title: Explained: Origin myth and history of the name of Lucknow, the ‘city of Laxman’ - The Indian Express
content:
1. Explained: Origin myth and history of the name of Lucknow, the ‘city of Laxman’  The Indian Express
  2. Explained: The buzz over renaming Lucknow to Lakshmanpuri and the city's connection to Laxman  Firstpost
  3. Will Laxmanpuri Become Lucknow's New Name? Yogi Adityanath's Tweet Sparks Name Change Speculations  India Today
  4. After Yogi’s tweet, fresh buzz over Lucknow name change  Hindustan Times
  5. Ab, Laxman ke naam: Yogi Adityanath’s tweet, statue set off talk of Lucknow renaming  The Indian Express
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: While Lucknow's name has long been associated with Laxman in the popular imagination, speculation about its possible renaming gained ground after the late BJP leader Lalji Tandon wrote a book, Ankaha Lucknow, in 2018, in which he lamented the loss of the city’s connection with the brother of Lord Ram.
